data.description: Help us change livesAt Exact Sciences, we’re helping change how the world prevents, detects and guides treatment for cancer. We give patients and clinicians the clarity needed to make confident decisions when they matter most. Join our team to find a purpose-driven career, an inclusive culture, and robust benefits to support your life while you’re working to help others.Position OverviewThis Commercial Customer Experience (CX) Analytics Intern position will support the commercial analytics team, focusing on customer experience effectiveness. The intern will design and evaluate A/B tests, report on customer experience initiatives, and visualize results. In addition to the stated duties, this position will also assist in developing reports and Tableau dashboards to track performance and progress toward goals. Join us in Madison, WI for a full-time, 12-week internship during summer 2026! The program is expected to begin in late May or early June. Qualified candidates may be eligible for a relocation stipend. Essential Duties Include, but are not limited to, the following: Query and analyze data to provide insights into customer experience performance, preparing regular reports and presentations summarizing findings. Support the development and enhancement of Tableau dashboards for optimal user experience. Ensure customer experience teams can easily access and interpret performance metrics. Design and evaluate customer experience A/B tests to improve operational metrics and customer satisfaction Identify growth opportunities by assessing customer experience team performance against key benchmarks and recommending areas for improvement. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including CX and commercial analytics, to provide actionable insights and recommendations. Apply strong analytical and problem-solving skills to interpret data and generate insights for improvement. Display effective communication skills to convey analysis results and recommendations to the customer experience and analytics teams. Display unwavering attention to detail to ensure accuracy in data analysis and reporting. Support the development of user guides and documentation for dashboards to assist in user inquiries and dashboard troubleshooting. Exercise the ability to work independently and as part of a team in a dynamic environment, showing flexibility and initiative. Uphold company mission and values through accountability, innovation, integrity, quality, and teamwork. Support and comply with the company’s Quality Management System policies and procedures. Maintain regular and reliable attendance. Ability to act with an inclusion mindset and model these behaviors for the organization. Ability to work designated schedule. Ability to work nights and/or weekends, as needed. Ability to work overtime, as needed. Ability to work on a mobile device, tablet, or in front of a computer screen and/or perform typing for approximately 80% of a typical working day. Ability to work on a computer and phone simultaneously. Ability to use a telephone through a headset. Minimum Qualifications Bachelor’s Degree in a relevant field such as Marketing, Data Science, Analytics, Business, or a related field. Currently enrolled in a Master’s Degree program, preferably in Analytics, Data Science, Business, or an MBA program with a focus on marketing or sales. Prior internship or project experience in data analysis is preferred but not required. Proficiency in SQL for querying and analyzing data. Experience with Python programming for data analysis and modeling. Familiarity with Tableau or other data visualization tools. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Ability to work independently and in a team, with strong collaboration and communication skills. Proficiency in Microsoft Office programs, including Excel (for data analysis, pivot tables, and reporting), PowerPoint(for creating presentations), Word (for documentation), and Outlook (for communication and calendar management). Demonstrated ability to perform the essential duties of the position with or without accommodation. Authorization to work in the United States without sponsorship. Preferred Qualifications Experience with Tableau for visualizing performance data. Previous internship or project experience in sales analytics, marketing, or commercial operations. Experience or coursework in predictive modeling or advanced analytics for customer experience data. Understanding of SQL and Python for data querying and analysis. #LI-MF1Salary Range:$35,000.00 - $56,000.00 The annual base salary shown is for this position located in US - WI - Madison on a full-time basis. Exact Sciences is proud to offer an employee experience that includes paid time off (including days for vacation, holidays, volunteering, and personal time), paid leave for parents and caregivers, a retirement savings plan, wellness support, and health benefits including medical, prescription drug, dental, and vision coverage. Learn more about our benefits.Our success relies on the experiences and perspectives of a diverse team, and Exact Sciences fosters a culture where all employees can develop personally and professionally with a sense of respect and belonging. If you require an accommodation, please contact us here.Not ready to apply? Join our Talent Community to stay updated on the latest news and opportunities at Exact Sciences.We are an equal employment opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to disability, protected veteran status, and any other status protected by applicable local, state, or federal law.To view the Right to Work, E-Verify Employer, and Pay Transparency notices and Federal, Federal Contractor, and State employment law posters, visit our compliance hub. The documents summarize important details of the law and provide key points that you have a right to know.
requirements: Bachelor’s Degree in a relevant field such as Marketing, Data Science, Analytics, Business, or a related field.

Prior internship or project experience in data analysis is preferred but not required.
